title: Flow Storage Post
description: Post data for the flow storage endpoint

limit.description: Limit the number of storage segments in each response page. Service implementations may specify their own default and maximum for the limit

object_ids.description: Array of object_ids to use. The supplied object_ids must be new and not already in use in this store. A 400 response will be returned if any supplied object_id already exists.

storage_id.description: The storage backend to allocate storage in. A storage backend identifier as advertised at the `/service` endpoint. If not set the default, as advertised at the `/service` endpoint, will be used if available. An invalid storage backend identifier will result in a 400 error.
